text: The European Statutory Instruments Committee is a select committee of the House of Commons in the Parliament of the United Kingdom. It has a remit to consider proposed instruments relating to the European Union. == Membership == As of 15 March 2020, the members of the committee are as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" valign="top" |Member ! valign="top" |Party ! valign="top" |Constituency |- | bgcolor="" | |Andrew Jones MP |Conservative |Harrogate & Knaresborough |- | bgcolor="" | |Kirsty Blackman MP |SNP |Aberdeen North |- | bgcolor="" | |Geraint Davies MP |Labour |Swansea West |- | bgcolor="" | |Rt. Hon Philip Dunne PC MP |Conservative |Ludlow |- | bgcolor="" | |Stephen Kinnock MP |Labour |Aberavon |- | bgcolor="" | |Rt. Hon. Sir David Evennett PC MP |Conservative |Bexleyheath and Crayford |- | bgcolor="" | |Vicky Ford MP |Conservative |Chelmsford |- | bgcolor="" | |Owen Thompson MP |SNP |Midlothian |- | bgcolor="" | |Flick Drummond MP |Conservative |Meon Valley |- | bgcolor="" | |Mark Garnier MP |Conservative |Wyre Forest |- | bgcolor="" | |Charlotte Nichols MP |Labour |Warrington North |- | bgcolor="" | |Richard Holden MP |Conservative |North West Durham |- | bgcolor="" | |Mary Robinson MP |Conservative |Cheadle |- | bgcolor="" | |Craig Williams MP |Conservative |Montgomeryshire |- | bgcolor="" | |Jo Stevens MP |Labour |Cardiff Central |- | bgcolor="" | |Liz Twist MP |Labour |Blaydon |} == See also == * List of Committees of the United Kingdom Parliament == References == Category:Select Committees of the British House of Commons
title: European Statutory Instruments Committee
